message: Welcome friend! Would you like to see what equipment I have available?

replies.text: Sure. Show me what you have.

message: Welcome traveller. Have you come to ask for help from me and the equipment I sell?
I must tell you that my supply is not what it used to be, now that the southern mine entrance has collapsed. Far fewer traders come here to Prim now.

replies.text: Ok, let me see your wares.

message: Regardless, I cannot help you. My services are only for residents of Prim, and I don't trust you enough yet. You might be a spy from the Blackwater Mountain settlement.
Welcome traveller, what can I do for you?

replies.text: Let me see what you have available to sell.

message: Sell? I'm sorry, my supply is all out. Now that the traders do not come here anymore, I don't get my regular shipments. So at the moment, I have nothing to trade with you unfortunately.
Please don't hurt me! I'm only doing my job here.
What are you looking at? These weapons in the crates over here are only for us guards.
(The guard looks down on you with a condescending look)
Oh, I am so tired. When will we ever get to rest?
Can't talk now. I'm on guard duty. If you need help, talk to someone else over there instead.
See these bars? They will hold for almost anything.
When my training is complete, I will be one of the greatest healers around!
Can't you see I'm trying to read over here? Talk to me in a while and I might be interested.
Can't talk now, I have work to do.
Are you the one I heard about? No, you can't be. I imagined someone taller.
Welcome friend! Would you like to browse my selection of fine potions and ointments?

replies.text: Sure. Show me what you have.

message: Welcome traveller. Have you come to ask for help from me and my potions?
